name: S.W.I.N.E.
summary: S.W.I.N.E. (Strategic Warfare In a Nifty Environment) is a real-time tactics game designed by FishTank Studios. The player chooses to fight as either the brutal invading pigs or the pacifist rabbits, and plays a series of missions. There are many units, including mortar, artillery, and tank units. There are also 10 multiplayer campaigns, each with many modes of play, including capture the flag and deathmatch.

alternative_names.name: Strategic Warfare In a Nifty Environment
